const triviagameText = "In this trivia game, you will be given 4 city names.  One of them is fake, which one.  I wanted to give myself a challenge.  I wrote this game initially in jQuery, but I rewrote the whole thing in Angular.  This biggest challenge for this project was learning the service functionality.  Data passing from parent to child was difficult, but finding an explaination for send data from child to distant aunt was not easy.  That is to say, until I stopped looking at third-party tutorials and just read Angular's own documentation.";
export default triviagameText;
